/* StockPeriodMapper.getStockPeriodList */ SELECT
TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tsssd.IOSTOCK_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS SALE_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tsssd.IOSTOCK_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'DY') AS YOIL,
TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS DAY_FROM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS DAY_TO,
A.LV1_CD, A.LV1_NM, A.LV2_CD, A.LV2_NM, A.LV3_CD, A.LV3_NM, tsssc.PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM, tsssc.STORE_CD, (SELECT STORE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE Z WHERE Z.STORE_CD = tsssc.STORE_CD) AS STORE_NM, tmpb.BARCD_CD,
SF_ZERO_TO_NULL((tsssc.CURR_QTY) / tmp.PO_UNIT_QTY) AS CURR_QTY, SF_ZERO_TO_NULL((tsssc.CURR_QTY) / tmp.PO_UNIT_QTY) AS CURR_QTY2, SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(tsssd.STORE_SALE_QTY) / tmp.PO_UNIT_QTY) AS ACC_STORE_SALE_QTY,
SF_ZERO_TO_NULL((tsssc.CURR_QTY)) AS CURR_QTY, SF_ZERO_TO_NULL((tsssc.CURR_QTY)) AS CURR_QTY2, SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(tsssd.STORE_SALE_QTY)) AS ACC_STORE_SALE_QTY,
SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(tsssd.PRDTION_IN_QTY)) AS ACC_PRDTION_IN_QTY, SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(tsssd.PRDTION_OUT_QTY)) AS ACC_PRDTION_OUT_QTY, SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(tsssd.MALL_SALE_QTY)) AS ACC_MALL_SALE_QTY, SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(tsssd.MALL_RTN_QTY)) AS ACC_MALL_RTN_QTY FROM (
SELECT A.HQ_OFFICE_CD , A.PROD_CLASS_CD , NULL LV1_CD , NULL LV2_CD , NULL LV3_CD , DECODE (A.LV ,1 ,SUBSTR(A.AC,INSTR(A.AC,'^',1,1)+1,LENGTH(A.AC)) , SUBSTR(A.AC,INSTR(A.AC,'^',1,1)+1,INSTR(A.AC,'^',2,1)-2) ) AS LV1_NM , DECODE (A.LV ,1 ,NULL ,2 ,SUBSTR(A.AC,INSTR(A.AC,'^',2,1)+1,LENGTH(A.AC)) ,3 ,SUBSTR(A.AC,INSTR(A.AC,'^',1,2)+1,(INSTR(A.AC,'^',1,3)-1)-INSTR(A.AC,'^',1,2)) ) AS LV2_NM , DECODE (A.LV ,1 ,NULL ,2 ,NULL ,3 ,SUBSTR(A.AC,INSTR(A.AC,'^',1,3)+1) ) AS LV3_NM FROM ( SELECT LEVEL LV, HQ_OFFICE_CD, PROD_CLASS_CD, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(PROD_CLASS_NM, '^') AS AC FROM ( SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, PROD_CLASS_CD, PROD_CLASS_NM, P_PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) START WITH P_PROD_CLASS_CD ='00000' AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD = P_PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) A
) A, TB_ST_STORE_STOCK_CUR tsssc, TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp, TB_MS_PRODUCT_BARCD tmpb, TB_ST_STORE_STOCK_DAILY tsssd WHERE 1=1 AND tmp.STORE_CD = tsssc.STORE_CD AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM TB_MS_STORE Z WHERE Z.STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND Z.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}) AND tsssc.STORAGE_CD = '999' AND tmp.PROD_CD = tsssc.PROD_CD AND tmp.STOCK_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND tmp.USE_YN = 'Y' AND tmpb.STORE_CD (+) = tsssc.STORE_CD AND tmpb.PROD_CD (+) = tsssc.PROD_CD AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD = A.PROD_CLASS_CD (+) AND tsssd.IOSTOCK_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND tsssd.STORE_CD (+)= tsssc.STORE_CD AND tsssd.STORAGE_CD (+)= tsssc.STORAGE_CD AND tsssd.PROD_CD (+)= tsssc.PROD_CD
AND tmp.STORE_CD IN
#{item}
AND tsssc.PROD_CD = #{prodCd}
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND tmpb.BARCD_CD = #{barcdCd}
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE STORE_CD = tsssc.STORE_CD START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND STORE_CD = tsssc.STORE_CD CONNECT BY PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD = P_PROD_CLASS_CD AND STORE_CD = tsssc.STORE_CD )
GROUP BY tsssd.IOSTOCK_DATE, A.LV1_CD, A.LV1_NM, A.LV2_CD, A.LV2_NM, A.LV3_CD, A.LV3_NM, tsssc.PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM, tsssc.STORE_CD, tsssc.STORE_CD, tmpb.BARCD_CD, tmp.PO_UNIT_QTY, tsssc.CURR_QTY ORDER BY tsssd.IOSTOCK_DATE, tsssc.PROD_CD, tsssc.STORE_CD
GROUP BY A.LV1_CD, A.LV1_NM, A.LV2_CD, A.LV2_NM, A.LV3_CD, A.LV3_NM, tsssc.PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM, tsssc.STORE_CD, tsssc.STORE_CD, tmpb.BARCD_CD, tmp.PO_UNIT_QTY, tsssc.CURR_QTY ORDER BY tsssc.PROD_CD, tsssc.STORE_CD
